What is the top speed of the Porsche 911.answer: The Porsche 911 can reach a top speed of 205 mph (330 km/h) depending on the model. The GT3 RS can reach up to 184 mph, while the Turbo S can reach 205 mph.

What is the acceleration time of a Porsc.answer: The Porsche 911 can accelerate from 0 to 60 mph in as little as 2.8 seconds (Turbo S model), while the base model achieves it in 4.2 seconds. The GT3 RS achieves 0-60 mph in 3.2 seconds.
